metadata.titleEn: Whole rock and single mineral geochemical data of Zongyang A-type granite in the Lower Yangtze River Belt
metadata.titleCn: 长江下游地区枞阳A型花岗岩的全岩及单矿物地球化学数据
metadata.description: The data are the whole rock major and trace elements and Sr-Nd isotopic geochemical data of granites in the Lower Yangtze River Belt, as well as zircon U-Pb dating data and in-situ Hf-O isotope, and in-situ major and trace elements geochemical data of apatite. The samples are A-type granites from Zongyang, and the lithology is alkali feldspar granite and quartz alkali feldspar syenite. The major elements data of whole rock were obtained by XRF analysis, the content of F element was obtained by ISE analysis, the trace elements data were obtained by ICP-MS analysis, and the Sr-Nd isotopic composition was obtained by MC-ICP-MS analysis. Zircon U-Pb isotopic dating and trace elements data were obtained by LA-ICP-MS analysis, in-situ O isotopic composition was obtained by SIMS analysis, and in-situ Lu-Hf isotopic data was obtained by LA-MC-ICP-MS analysis. The major and trace elements data of apatite were obtained by EMPA and LA-ICP-MS, respectively. The above data have been published in high-level SCI journals, and the data are true and reliable. Through the data obtained, we can study the source composition and magmatic process of the A1 and A2 type granites, and constrain the tectonic evolution of the Lower Yangtze River Belt.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据为长江下游花岗岩的全岩主、微量元素和Sr-Nd同位素地球化学数据，以及锆石U-Pb测年数据和原位Hf-O同位素，磷灰石原位主、微量元素地球化学数据。样品为采自枞阳的A型花岗岩，岩性为碱性长石花岗岩和石英碱性长石正长岩。全岩主量元素数据由XRF分析获得，F元素的含量由ISE分析获得，微量元素数据由ICP-MS分析获得，Sr-Nd同位素组成由MC-ICP-MS分析获得。锆石U-Pb同位素测年数据和微量元素数据由LA-ICP-MS分析获得，原位O同位素组成由SIMS分析获得，原位Lu-Hf同位素数据由LA-MC-ICP-MS分析获得。磷灰石的主量、微量元素数据分别由EMPA和LA-ICP-MS分析获得。以上数据已发表于高级别SCI期刊，数据真实可靠。通过获得的数据，可以研究旨A1和A2型花岗岩的源区成分和岩浆作用过程，制约长江下游地区的构造演化。
metadata.instructions: All data are stored in Excel file and can be opened directly in Excel workbook. The file named "WR_MajTra" represents the geochemical data of major and trace elements in the whole rock, "WR_ SrNd" represents the whole rock Sr-Nd radioisotope data, "Zrn_UPbTra" represents zircon U-Pb isotopic composition and age data as well as trace elements data, "Zrn_HfO" stands for zircon Hf-O isotope data, "AP_MajTra" represents the major and trace elements geochemical data of apatite.
metadata.instructionsCn: 所有数据以Excel文件存储，可直接使用Excel工作薄打开。名称为“WR_MajTra”的文件代表全岩主微量元素地球化学数据，“WR_SrNd”代表全岩Sr-Nd放射性同位素数据，”Zrn_UPbTra”代表锆石U-Pb同位素组成和年龄数据以及微量元素数据，“Zrn_HfO”代表锆石Hf-O同位素数据，“Ap_MajTra”代表磷灰石主、微量元素地球化学数据。

literatureList.referenceEn: Jiang, X. Y., Wu, K., Luo, J. C., Zhang, L. P., Sun, W. D., & Xia, X. P. (2020). An A1-type granite that borders A2-type: insights from the geochemical characteristics of the Zongyang A-type granite in the Lower Yangtze River Belt, China. International Geology Review, 62(17), 2203-2220.

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific analytical techniques used to determine the elemental and isotopic composition in a dataset focusing on A-type granite geochemistry from the Lower Yangtze River region?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在关注长江下游地区A型花岗岩地球化学的数据集中，用于确定元素和同位素组成的具体分析技术有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: XRF analysis for whole-rock major elements, ISE analysis for F element content, ICP-MS for trace elements, MC-ICP-MS for Sr-Nd isotopes, LA-ICP-MS for zircon U-Pb dating and trace elements, SIMS for in-situ O isotopes, LA-MC-ICP-MS for in-situ Lu-Hf isotopes, EMPA and LA-ICP-MS for apatite major and trace elements
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: XRF分析用于全岩主要元素，ISE分析用于F元素含量，ICP-MS用于微量元素，MC-ICP-MS用于Sr-Nd同位素，LA-ICP-MS用于锆石U-Pb定年和微量元素，SIMS用于原位O同位素，LA-MC-ICP-MS用于原位Lu-Hf同位素，EMPA和LA-ICP-MS用于磷灰石主要和微量元素。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'LA-ICP-MS' mean in the context of geochemical data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在地球化学数据收集的背景下，“LA-ICP-MS”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: LA-ICP-MS stands for Laser Ablation Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry, a technique used for obtaining zircon U-Pb isotopic dating and trace element data as part of geochemical analyses in granite samples.
Definition.AnswerCn: LA-ICP-MS代表激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱，是一种用于获取锆石U-Pb同位素定年和微量元素数据的技术，作为花岗岩样品地球化学分析的一部分。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can the combination of geochemical and isotopic data reveal about the magmatic processes and tectonic evolution in the lower Yangtze River region?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 地球化学和同位素数据的结合可以揭示长江下游地区的岩浆过程和构造演化吗？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The combination of whole-rock major and trace elements, Sr-Nd isotopes, zircon U-Pb dating, in-situ Hf-O isotopes, and apatite geochemistry can provide insights into the source composition and magmatic processes of A1 and A2 type granites. These data can help in constraining the tectonic evolution of the lower Yangtze River region.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 全岩主要和微量元素、锶-铷同位素、锆石U-Pb定年、原位铪-氧同位素以及磷灰石地球化学的组合可以为A1和A2型花岗岩的源成分和岩浆过程提供见解。这些数据有助于限制长江下游地区的构造演化。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of utilizing a combination of XRF, ISE, ICP-MS, LA-ICP-MS, MC-ICP-MS, SIMS, and EMPA techniques on the reliability and comprehensiveness of geochemical datasets for A-type granite studies in the Yangtze River lower reaches?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 利用XRF、ISE、ICP-MS、LA-ICP-MS、MC-ICP-MS、SIMS和EMPA技术的组合对长江下游A型花岗岩研究的地球化学数据集的可靠性和全面性可能产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing a combination of techniques such as XRF, ISE, ICP-MS, LA-ICP-MS, MC-ICP-MS, SIMS, and EMPA can enhance the reliability and comprehensiveness of geochemical datasets by providing a detailed and multi-faceted analysis of A-type granites. This approach allows for thorough characterization of major and trace elements, isotopic compositions, and precise dating, which could lead to a more accurate understanding of the source composition and magmatic processes. Additionally, the integration of these various techniques can mitigate the limitations inherent in using a single method, resulting in a more robust dataset that can better constrain the tectonic evolution of the Yangtze River lower reaches.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用XRF、ISE、ICP-MS、LA-ICP-MS、MC-ICP-MS、SIMS和EMPA等多种技术的结合，可以通过提供对A型花岗岩的详细和多方面的分析，增强地球化学数据集的可靠性和全面性。这种方法允许对主要和微量元素、同位素组成以及精确测年进行彻底表征，从而可能导致对源成分和岩浆过程的更准确理解。此外，这些不同技术的整合可以减轻使用单一方法固有的局限性，从而产生更强大的数据集，更好地约束长江下游的构造演化。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the purpose of collecting whole-rock and single mineral geochemical data, including major and trace elements, Sr-Nd isotopes, and zircon U-Pb dating, for A-type granite in the lower reaches of the Yangtze River?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集全岩和单矿物地球化学数据，包括主量和微量元素、Sr-Nd同位素以及锆石U-Pb定年的目的是什么，用于长江下游的A型花岗岩？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The purpose of collecting these geochemical data is to study the source compositions and magmatic processes of A1 and A2 type granites, and to constrain the tectonic evolution of the lower reaches of the Yangtze River region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集这些地球化学数据的目的是研究A1和A2型花岗岩的源成分和岩浆过程，并约束长江下游地区的构造演化。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedural steps involved in obtaining geochemical data of whole rock and mineral samples, including major and trace elements, from granitic rocks in geological studies?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在地质研究中获取花岗岩整体岩石和矿物样品的地球化学数据，包括主要和微量元素的程序步骤是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To obtain geochemical data of whole rock and mineral samples from granitic rocks, several analytical techniques are employed. Major element data for whole rock samples are obtained using X-ray fluorescence (XRF) analysis, while trace element data are acquired through inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS). The concentration of the element F is determined using ion-selective electrode (ISE) analysis. For isotopic compositions, Sr-Nd isotopes are analyzed using multi-collector ICP-MS (MC-ICP-MS). Zircon U-Pb isotopic dating and trace element data are collected through laser ablation ICP-MS (LA-ICP-MS), whereas in situ oxygen isotopes are measured using secondary ion mass spectrometry (SIMS), and in situ Lu-Hf isotopic data are gathered using LA-MC-ICP-MS. Apatite major and trace element data are obtained via electron microprobe analysis (EMPA) and LA-ICP-MS, respectively. These data help in understanding the source composition and magmatic processes of A1 and A2 type granites, as well as constraining the tectonic evolution of the region.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了获得花岗岩的全岩和矿物样品的地球化学数据，采用了几种分析技术。全岩样品的主要元素数据通过X射线荧光（XRF）分析获得，而微量元素数据则通过感应耦合等离子体质谱（ICP-MS）获得。氟元素的浓度通过离子选择电极（ISE）分析确定。对于同位素组成，锶-铌同位素通过多收集器ICP-MS（MC-ICP-MS）分析。锆石U-Pb同位素定年和微量元素数据通过激光剥蚀ICP-MS（LA-ICP-MS）收集，而原位氧同位素则通过次级离子质谱（SIMS）测量，原位铒-铪同位素数据则通过LA-MC-ICP-MS收集。磷灰石的主要和微量元素数据通过电子探针分析（EMPA）和LA-ICP-MS获得。这些数据有助于理解A1和A2型花岗岩的源成分和岩浆过程，以及约束该地区的构造演化。
